2.0.name: wordpress/wordpress-password-register
2.0.description:
WP User Registration is a plugin for change Wordpress original registration interface for users to register their choice passwords and other item(like aim, gtalk, nickname and so on), and no longer produced by the system password and sent to mail, and an increase in the registration process of validation code to prevent malicious registration.

For screenshots, please visit the official plugin page.

Admin Features

  • Admin and Users Panel Options
  • Can choose using validation code or not
  • Can choose some other item you want to input on register

User Features

  • Choose own passwords when register.
  • Must input validation code to prevent malicious registration.

Plugin Features
